title: Kathi Kinnear Hill - "But I Just Might"
description:
This week, Kathi Kinnear Hill has hard conversations on the campaign trail. This week’s episode of The Moth Podcast is hosted by Jon Goode. Head to the extras for this weeks episode for photos from Kathi, as well as information about registering to vote - themoth.org/extras.

Hosted by: Jon Goode

Storyteller: Kathi Kinnear Hill
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kathi Kinnear Hill has hard conversations on the campaign trail.
